title: Nadia Bartel appears downcast as she leaves her Melbourne home
text:
Nadia Bartel looked downcast as she left her family home in Melbourne on Friday, just one day after her estranged husband Jimmy stepped out publicly with his new girlfriend, Lauren Mand, for the first time.

The 34-year-old blogger appeared sombre as she clutched a laptop in one hand and her car keys in the other, keeping her head down as she left the premises.

The mother-of-two revealed her slender frame in a snakeskin print skirt and a long sleeve black top, and appeared to be wearing minimal makeup.

Sombre outing: Nadia Bartel looked downcast as she left her family home in Melbourne on Friday, just one day after her estranged husband Jimmy stepped out publicly with his new girlfriend, Lauren Mand, for the first time

Her wedding ring was noticeably absent from her finger and she wore no other accessories with her ensemble.

Nadia was leaving her marital home after she moved out of the premises and in with her parents a few months ago following her split with Jimmy.

Just a day earlier, Jimmy, 35, and Lauren made their public debut when they stepped out to buy nappies together in Melbourne.

Feeling low: The 34-year-old blogger appeared sombre as she left her family home in Melbourne on Friday

On the move: Clutching a laptop in one hand and her car keys in the other, Nadia kept her head down as she left the premises

The retired AFL star and the blonde also looked decidedly downcast as they visited a discount pharmacy to make the purchase - presumably for Henley, the 11-month-old son Jimmy shares with Nadia.

Lauren appeared glum as she strolled next to a Jimmy with a plastic bag in hand, and at one stage even pulled a grimacing expression.

Despite the less-than-glamorous circumstances, she was dressed to impress in a sleek black pea coat layered over a brown mini dress.

Nappy ever after! Jimmy Bartel, 35, and new girlfriend Lauren Mand made their public debut as they stepped out in Melbourne on Thursday

Why so serious? The retired AFL star and the blonde looked decidedly downcast as they visited a discount pharmacy to purchase a pack of nappies

She completed her look with a pair of black tights, leather booties and a cross body handbag.

Jimmy looked comparatively understated, donning a black sweater, matching cargo shorts, polka-dot socks and a pair of scruffy white sneakers.

The former Geelong Cats player tucked the large pack of nappies behind one arm while juggling his mobile phone and car keys between his hands.

Trying to fly under the radar? Jimmy looked understated, donning a black sweater, matching cargo shorts, polka-dot socks and a pair of scruffy white sneakers

Juggling too many things at once? The former Geelong Cats player tucked the large pack of nappies behind one arm while juggling his mobile phone and car keys between his hands

According to onlookers, the pair arrived at the pharmacy together, but quickly parted ways after realising they had been recognised.

Lauren even attempted to cover her face with her hands as the couple swiftly retreated to Jimmy's car.

Jimmy was first linked to Lauren just days after his split with Nadia was made public in August, but the couple are yet to comment on their relationship.

Mayday! Lauren even attempted to cover her face with her hands as the couple swiftly retreated to their car

Time to go! According to onlookers, the pair arrived at the pharmacy together, but quickly parted ways after realising they had been recognised

In September, Daily Mail Australia revealed that Lauren was planning to move back to Australia after spending several months living in England.

She uploaded a post to a Facebook group for Australian expats in which she listed her two-bedroom London apartment for sublet.

In the ad, Lauren explained she would be returning home on September 22 and was looking for someone to take over her $1,500-a-month room 'ASAP'.

Splitsville: The Bartels announced their split on August 15 - around two months after Nadia moved out of their marital home in Melbourne

She had relocated from Melbourne to London earlier this year, but is now believed to be living in Australia permanently.

The Bartels announced their split on August 15 - around two months after Nadia moved out of their marital home in Melbourne.

The pair married in February 2014 in a lavish ceremony on the Bellarine Peninsula, and they share two sons, three-year-old Aston and 11-month-old Henley.
description: The 34-year-old blogger appeared sombre as she clutched a laptop in one hand and her car keys in the other, keeping her head down as she left the premises.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
